mapper.select: select substrb(birth,1,4) from person where id=#{value}
select substrb(birth,5,2) from person where id=#{value}
select substrb(birth,7,2) from person where id=#{value}
select count(*) from payment where buyer=#{id}and parentseq=(select parentseq from payment where buyer=#{id}and paymentable=#{y})

select distinct name,address1,payment.item,payment.buyer,payment.seller,payment.parentseq,payment.price,to_char(payment.paymentdate,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi')as paymentdate,payment.boardtype,lf.sysname from lendboard lb left join (select SYSNAME, PARENTSEQ, REGDATE from ( select ROW_NUMBER() over (PARTITION BY lendfiles.PARENTSEQ order by lendfiles.REGDATE asc ) AS RNUM, lendfiles.* from lendfiles ) TB where RNUM=1 ) lf on lb.SEQ=lf.PARENTSEQ join payment on(lb.seq = payment.parentseq) join person on (person.id=payment.buyer) where payment.seller=#{id} and payment.boardtype=#{product} and payment.paymentable=#{y} order by 1 desc

select distinct name,payment.item,payment.buyer,payment.seller,payment.parentseq,payment.price,to_char(payment.paymentdate,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi')as paymentdate,payment.boardtype,lf.sysname from lendboard lb left join (select SYSNAME, PARENTSEQ, REGDATE from ( select ROW_NUMBER() over (PARTITION BY lendfiles.PARENTSEQ order by lendfiles.REGDATE asc ) AS RNUM, lendfiles.* from lendfiles ) TB where RNUM=1 ) lf on lb.SEQ=lf.PARENTSEQ join payment on(lb.seq = payment.parentseq) join person on (person.id=payment.seller) where payment.buyer=#{id} and payment.boardtype=#{product} and payment.paymentable=#{y} order by 1 desc

select distinct name,review.contents,payment.item,payment.buyer,payment.seller,payment.parentseq,payment.price,to_char(payment.paymentdate,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi')as paymentdate,payment.boardtype,review.reviewable,lf.sysname from lendboard lb left join (select SYSNAME, PARENTSEQ, REGDATE from ( select ROW_NUMBER() over (PARTITION BY lendfiles.PARENTSEQ order by lendfiles.REGDATE asc ) AS RNUM, lendfiles.* from lendfiles ) TB where RNUM=1 ) lf on lb.SEQ=lf.PARENTSEQ join payment on(lb.seq = payment.parentseq) join person on (person.id=payment.seller) join review on (review.reviewer =payment.buyer and review.recipient = payment.seller and review.parentseq = payment.parentseq ) where payment.buyer=#{id} and payment.boardtype=#{product} and payment.paymentable=#{y} order by 1 desc
